    @pytest.mark.apitest
    @allure.title("Проверка Проверка https://dev-api.getprime.pro/api/v1/certificates/catalog - Positive")
    @allure.description("Позитивная проверка catalog с проверкой обязательных полей 'merchant, timezones, designs, faces'")
    def test_certificate_catalog(self):
        url_certificates_catalog = os.getenv("url_certificates_catalog")
        with allure.step(f"Проверка {url_certificates_catalog} на 200"):
            assert requests.get(url=url_certificates_catalog,
                                headers={"Authorization": f"Bearer {access_token_frontend}"}).status_code == 200, "Статус код не 200"
            response = requests.get(url=url_certificates_catalog,
                                    headers={"Authorization": f"Bearer {access_token_frontend}"}).json()
